ruleSearch.author: a
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
data=JSON.parse(String(java.getElements('script.-1')).replace(/<\/?script>/g,'').replace(/window\.__pinia=/,''));
list=[];
for(d of data.my.search.novelList.result){
	ll={};
	k="";
	ll.n=d.title;
	ll.a=d.userVo.name;
	for(t of d.tagVos){
		k+=t.title+',';
	}
	ll.k=String(k).replace(/\,$/,'');
	ll.l=d.updatedAt;
	ll.i=d.intro;	
	ll.c='https://img.huahuo6.com/'+d.coverImageVo.path;	ll.b='https://api.huahuo6.com/api/novel/detail?id=' + d.id+'&_t='+Math.round(new Date());
	list.push(ll)
}
list
</js>
ruleSearch.name: n

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
data=JSON.parse(src).data;
list=[];
for(v of data.volumeVos){
	list.push({"text":v.title,"vo":1})
	for(c of v.chapterVos){	h="https://api.huahuo6.com/api/novel/read?chapterId="+c.id+"&_t="+Math.round(new Date);
		list.push({"text":c.title,"href":h})
	}
}
list
</js>
